comment.body:
> 
> I think the most of users use free version, with disabled anvanced blocking (no DNS filtering, no CSS, no scriptlets)

True except for no DNS filtering (just set DNS to AGDNS). Anyway why don't fix?

@SKEIDs 
Test adding only `rocketnews24.com,youpouch.com,soranews24.com#%#//scriptlet('abort-on-property-read', 'jQuery')`, this will probably work.
